inn1.comm: starts with one right on target, jagging into the right-hander after pitching outside off, defended towards cover
drags this one short, and on the leg stump, turned away towards fine leg
reverts to an outside-off line, Fletcher chops that firmly towards point
back of a length, pitching on middle and leg, tipped towards midwicket by Fletcher to get off the mark
a little bit of movement away from the batsman, started a touch wide outside off and seamed further away

gone! Aamer continues to take wickets in his first over, caught and bowled, a slightly overpitched ball coming into the pads, Richards looked to drive it past the bowler, checked his drive, and the ball lobs towards the bowler, who jumps and  takes an overhead catch
he's also starts accurately, keeping it one off, slightly short, defended by Fletcher
the batsman wasn't too comfortable playing that one, extra bounce for Naved, played with soft hands by Fletcher, the ball thuds into his gloves and dribbles to the leg side
this one is too wide outside off, he'll have to re-bowl that one
a slightly slower ball from Naved, shortish and Fletcher defends off the back foot
the ball shapes away from the batsman, who was looking to defend back down the pitch, gets  an outside edge and runs away towards gully

that was dangerous for West Indies, a direct hit would have sent Fletcher back, Smith turned the  ball behind square on the leg side, and set off, Shoaib Malik was onto it in a flash, his throw is just wide
moving away from the batsman, tried to push at it, a thick outside edge towards cover point
more movement for Aamer, going away after starting outside off, a loose waft at it sends it past the vacant third slip towards third man
gets on the back foot and chops it past point for a single
Aamer keeps it tight, defended back down the pitch
length ball, heading for offstump, batsman looks to defend, gets an inside edge towards midwicket
short ball, outside off, Smith goes for a flamboyant pull, misses, great carry through to the keeper, who collects it over his head
superb bowling from Aamer, Smith seems pretty clueless out there, this one was in the corridor outside off, he tries to defend but is beaten
loose drive from Fletcher, that was a wide ball outside off, swinging away, the batsman looks to smash it through covers but misses
this is much better from Fletcher,straight back over the bowler's head, hardly any follow-through, great timing on that one fetches him a boundary
this time the ball moves into Fletcher, a slower ball, Fletcher gets an inside edge which rolls dangerously close to his stumps
jagging away from the right-hander this time, Fletcher is beaten by the movement, great bowling from Naved
length ball outside off, blocked back toward the bowler

Pakistan have two! Fletcher hacks it towards backward point where Imran Nazir takes an easy shoulder-high catch, it was a back of a length ball, not exactly one he should have been playing off the front foot, Fletcher decides to go through with his shot and can't get it away over the fielder
Aamer pegs away at offstump, defended by Smith
this one pitches on a length outside off, moves away from the left-hander, Smith is beaten yet again, he is struggling here
Smith decides to hit out of trouble, again going for a powerful pull, mistimes it towards mid-on, where Saeed Ajmal misfields to give away a couple of extra runs
nice and tight from Aamer, back of a length and coming into the batsman, who hops onto the back foot and defends towards the bowler

The West Indies top order is crumbling here to some top-quality pace bowling, Dowlin is the man to go this time, that ball was cutting sharply into him after pitching outside off, it was very close to his body but he decides to goes for the cut, only gets a bottom-edge to the keeper
jumps across his stumps to get behind the line of his first delivery, defends solidly back down the pitch
Smith's torrid time continues, he was looking to swipe that one towards the leg side, gets an edge which has the ball rolling towards the covers
beautiful delivery from Naved, moving fractionally across Smith who is all at sea here, he is beaten again
strays onto the pads, tapped just behind square leg
well-disguised slower ball this time, Smith gets forwards and slaps it towards point
moving in after pitching on middle, Smith jumps back and turns it towards midwicket for a single
Refier shoulders arm to a delivery outside off, moving his front foot exaggeratedly across the stumps as he leaves the ball
Smith has preferred to offer a horizontal bat to the bowling today, again he looks to swipe it but mistimes towards midwicket
on middle and leg, pushed towards midwicket this time
he spears that one down the leg side
gives the batsman a  lot of width, Smith carves that past point for a couple of runs
another short ball, Smith stands tall and slaps it through the covers for a boundary
again it's short, well outside off, helped along to third man for a single
fuller this time, Smith pushes the ball towards cover and immediately sets off for a single
nice line from Naved, just outside off, angling across the batsman, Reifer shoulders arms
Reifer drops the ball towards the leg side and calls for a single, quick running there, the batsmen scamper through before Naved can run across and get the ball
Naved keeps it steady, defended back down the pitch
just outside off, pushed towards cover off the front foot
slower delivery from Naved, the batsman gets behind the line and punches firmly to mid-off
end of a steady over from Naved, on middle and leg, pushed back to the bowler
starts off with a bouncer, too high for the umpire's liking
back of a length, in the channel outside off, tapped towards the off side by the batsman
length ball on the pads, flicked behind square leg, an easy couple there
similar length, on middle stump this time, nudged towards midwicket this time, 'No' Reifer shouts when Smith calls for a single
Gul keeps it at a short of length, Reifer stays on the back foot and blocks towards cover
angling across the batsman, who lifts the bat high over his head as he lets the ball through to the keeper
pitched up this time, solid forward defensive from the batsman
a bit of width outside off, dabbed behind point for a single
left alone this time, angling across the left-handed batsman, great carry through to the keeper
well wide of offstump this time, left alone again
free-hit coming up, Naved oversteps as he sends down a delivery that cuts into the batsman and thuds into his pads
a slower deliver well outside off, slapped towards point, where Nazir fumbles to give away a single
a good-looking square drive from Smith, Nazir makes ground quickly to cut that one off
Nazir has some more fielding practise, as Smith chops a wide delivery towards him
short and wide from Gul, cracked towards third man, Naved does well to stop that one near the boundary
no one is going to stop that one, Smith is growing in confidence here, plenty of room to free his arms, and he wallops that past point

and it works, Smith offers a simple catch to Umar Akmal at second slip,  Gul extracts some extra bounce, that back of a length ball was coming into Smith as well, who can only glove the ball as he fends at it, the ball pops and sails to second slip, Smith done in by the commentator's curse
a full toss on offstump, turned towards midwicket
a back of a length ball, on off stump, played with soft hands towards cover, the batsmen zip through for a single
Reifer gets well behind the line and defends back down the pitch
starts with a short of length ball angling across Bernard, who hops onto the back foot and taps it towards cover
short and a bit of width, Bernard cracks that powerfully past backward point, lovely shot, that will give him some confidence
'Nooo' Bernard shouts to his partner after dropping the ball toward cover
a hint of movement into Bernard, hits him on the thigh pad as he looks to turn it towards midwicket
Aamer keeps it tight around off, defended solidly towards cover
angling across the batsman, who shoulders arms to that one
Reifer was in two minds, whether to play or to leave that wide delivery, he toe ends it towards third man as he looks to leave the ball
defended of the back foot to the leg side, Bernard sets off for a single but is sent back by his captain
length ball just outside off, thick inside-edge onto his pads
short of length, well outside off, guided past backward point for a single
full delivery pitching just outside off, blocked towards mid-on by Reifer
Reifer rocks onto the backfoot, gets behind the line and defends down the pitch
back of length from Aamer, on leg stump, Bernard looks to clip it towards the leg side but is rapped on his thigh pad
fullish delivery, just outside off, a thick inside edge onto his pads this time
off stump is lying on the ground, Aamer has his third, that moves into the batsman just a bit and sneaks between Bernard's bat and pad, we could have a very short match on our hands here
shortish ball on leg stump, Sammy gets behind the line and defends
angling across Sammy, who is not interested in playing that one
lovely drive from Sammy, gets on the front foot and square-drives that one firmly, not a bad shot to get off the mark
that one kept a touch low, pitching on a back of a length on leg stump, Reifer has to adjust late to defend that one
on middle and leg, Reifer turns that to midwicket off the backfoot

the procession continues, this is making a mockery of the "eight best teams" concept the ICC wanted, extra bounce does the job yet again, Reifer fends at one close to his body, top edges it to first slip

Oh my goodness, that's another one down, a full delivery that was coming into the batsman, who looked to turn it to the leg side, he misses that was going on to hit middle and leg, umpire Harper sends Walton on his way for a golden duck.
Nikita Miller doesn't just survive the hat-trick, he chops it away for a boundary past cover, it was full and wide, Miller times that wonderfully
Gul ends the over with a delivery that is full and outside off, punched towards extra cover
Sammy gets well behind the line and defends an offstump delivery
looks to thrash this length ball past extra cover, rolls off the toe end of the bat towards mid-off
back of a length on middle and leg, defended to the leg side
Sammy is struggling here, this one was angling across him and he swings at it and is beaten
similar delivery, left alone by Sammy this time, exaggerated away movement after the ball passed the stumps
Aamer completes the maiden by sending down a length ball on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
a beauty from Gul to start the over, moving away from the batsman after pitching on offstump, Miller offers a weak prod at it and is beaten
slightly wider this time, Miller steers it to backward point
Gul keeps it close to offstump, shorter this time, Miller defends off the back foot
Gul keeps it on target, Miller gets forward and blocks that one
immaculate line from Gul, shortish ball this time, tests Miller's backfoot defensive technique
tapped towards extra cover, and that's the second maiden on the trot
starts with a legbreak that is defended back to the bowler
cracked past extra cover for a boundary, lovely drive from Sammy
well outside off, left alone by the batsman
very full from Afridi, Sammy helps himself to another boundary, a touch squarer this time
a quick googly from Afridi this time, Sammy can't get that one away, edges onto the pads
pushed towards extra cover for a single
Gul digs in the bouncer, Sammy spots it early and ducks under it
a length ball this time, Sammy shows the full face of the bat as he punches it firmly towards the bowler, Gul can't stop the ball but takes the pace off it and it rolls towards mid-on
tight delivery on the stumps, Sammy gets right behind the line to defend
a slower ball from Gul, rolling his fingers as he bowls that one, too far outside off to trouble the batsman
the batsman is squared up as he defends an offstump delivery from Gul
another maiden for Gul, it ends with the batsman defending the last ball off the back foot towards gully
fullish delivery, pushed to extra cover
again it is overpitched, defended to short cover
a touch shorter, a bit of width, driven towards the sweeper
tries to whip that towards midwicket, inside edges it onto his pads
Sammy offers the forward press to keep out Afridi's delivery
huge appeal for lbw, Sammy doesn't pick the googly, lets it go, is hit just above the knee roll, it was the height that saved him
driven off the back foot towards cover point
a bouncer that is well outside off, chopped towards third man for a single
back-of-the-hand slower delivery, on middle stump, tapped towards mid-on
that one whistle down the leg side
length ball on middle and leg, the batsman hops onto the back foot and turns it towards midwicket
another slower ball, full and outside off, played with soft hands towards point
very full and outside off, jabbed towards point for a single, Nazir dives to get a hand on that one
Afridi tosses that one up, turns slightly and gets the edge, flies wide of first slip and races to the third man boundary
defended off the back foot towards the off side
on middle and leg, clipped towards square leg
full and outside off, driven towards extra cover
quicker googly from Afridi, blocked off the backfoot
quicker one, fired into the pads, tapped wide of mid-on
great delivery from Naved, length ball that held its line after pitching just outside off, Sammy is beaten, he acknowledges how good that delivery was
full and just outside off, cracked past extra cover for a boundary
back of a length ball, just outside off, Sammy feels for it outside off and is beaten again
strays onto the pads, guided to the fine leg boundary by Sammy
on middle and leg, Sammy shuffles across and nudges it towards midwicket, Sammy nearly trod onto the stumps playing that shot as his backfoot slipped alarmingly close to the wicket
well outside off, steered towards third man for a single
defended towards cover point
gets behind the line of the googly and blocks it back down the pitch
tossed up this time, the turn gives the batsman room to cut the ball past point
gets well forward, keeps bat and pad close together as he smothers that one
quicker one, on the pads, batsman top edges the ball as he looks to sweep, there's no short midwicket in place, otherwise he was a goner
driven firmly to long-off for a single
goes for the cut but the ball slides under his bat
defended towards point off the front foot
appeal for lbw, but Sammy was hit well outside the line and was looking to drive that one
floated outside off, left alone!
Ajmal strikes in his first over, a lot of flight from Ajmal, the batsman yorks himself by getting on the front foot, the batsman misses the ball and offstump is knocked back
the doosra makes it appearance, Best thought it would turn in and was ready to defend, but it spun away
stands tall and pushes it towards cover, the batsmen sprint through for a single
the googly, the batsman wanted to drive it through off, ends up playing it towards mid-on
defended towards the off side
fullish ball on middle and leg, clipped behind square leg
slightly short and a bit of width, guided towards point
defends this one off the front foot, it was just outside off
gets well forward and defends towards the off side
flighted delivery, overpitched outside off, gets a big stride in and crunches that past point for a boundary
length delivery, played with an open face towards backward point
the doosra from Ajmal, Miller was looking to mow that to midwicket but he misses
a quicker delivery, gets the outside edge, but is flies past a diving Misbah at first slip, second boundary of the over
three boundaries in the over, this time Ajmal overpitches, Miller gets forward and powers it past extra cover
length ball on middle and leg, turned behind square leg
short and wide, steered towards deep backward point for a couple
bangs in the bouncer, that one is too high though, he'll have to rebowl that one
length ball again, just outside off, pushed towards cover
fullish ball, slightly slower, on offstump, pushed towards cover
back of a length, on middle and leg, the batsman tries to get that away towards fine leg, but inside edges it onto his body
surprises the batsman with the extra bounce, the bottom hand came off the bat as Tino Best kept that offstump delivery out
very wide outside off, the batsman throws his bat at that one, gets it away above cover point's head
this one turned into the batsman, who was looking to defend, gets an inside edge, the ball race towards the fine-leg boundary, Gul tries to cut it off but this outfield is extremely quick
overpitched outside off, squeezed out towards point
outside off, Best decides to leave it alone
looked for the big mow to midwicket, but misses the ball
back of a length ball, pitching on middle, batsman defends off the front foot
shortish ball on offstump, driven back towards the bowler, was in the air for a bit, but drops short of Gul
an ungainly heave sends an offstump ball scurrying towards midwicket
full ball just outside off, and Nikita Miller gets into the 40s by lashing that one past extra cover, powerful shot that one
a short ball outside off, pushed towards cover for a single
full and on the pads, clipped towards midwicket for a single which gives Miller the strike
a slower delivery on offstump to end the over, tapped towards cover
nudged towards backward point
that one spat up after pitching on a length outside off, Akmal does well to collect that one
way outside off stump, Best slog sweeps towards mid-on
blocked towards cover point
gets well forward, keeps bat and pad together as he defends
and again, Miller gets forward and bends his knee as he blocks the ball
Pakistan strike first ball after drinks. Tino Best was drawn out of the crease by Ajmal, the turn beats the batsman, Akmal whips off the bails, and Best's stay at the crease is over
is struck on the pads well outside the off stump
shortish ball, on middle and leg, turned to backward square leg
blocked towards backward point
blocks an outside-off delivery towards midwicket
quicker one that went straight on, Tonge somehow keeps it out, an edge takes the ball towards deep backward point
driven off the backfoot towards long-off for a single, Miller gets the strike
Miller has decided there's no pint hanging around, plants his front foot down the ground, and a clean swing of his bat sends the ball soaring over the extra cover boundary
defended off the front foot
outside off and that one is left alone
chopped towards backward point
full ball on the pads, turned to midwicket for a single which brings up Miller's first ODI half-century, he retains the strike as well
Miller shows us his forward defensive technique
defended solidly back down the pitch
steered towards third man for a single
gets forward and guides the ball towards cover point
on middle and leg, nudged towards square leg
on the pads, guided towards backward square leg
an overpitched delivery is muscled towards deep extra cover
that's the end of the innings, Miller comes down the track and his big hit only finds Shoaib Malik at long-on

inn2.comm: back of a length ball well outside off, Nazir toe ends it towards midwicket
inside-edged onto the thigh pads, the ball rolls away to the leg side, Sammy is onto it quickly, and Nazir is forced to turn back after initially thinking of a single
short and wide, go ahead and help yourself,  Nazir gets on the back foot and crunches that over point for a boundary
mistimes his drive back towards the bowler
full and on the pads, flicked away towards deep square leg, fine leg is inside the circle
good ball to end the over, back of a length on offstump, Kamran blocks it off the back foot

Fantastic start for Tonge, makes an absolute mess of Imran Nazir's stumps, a wildly ambitious shot attempted by Nazir, looking to whip a full-length ball behind square, he misses and middle stump is uprooted
back of a length ball, solid defense from Malik
well outside off, left alone by the batsman
Malik goes for a wild heave himself, that was well outside off, Malik looked to thrash that past cover but misses
slow ball, full outside off, forced towards backward point
Malik keeps that one out, not too convincing, it jagged back sharply off a back of a length
gets forward and defends an outside off delivery
length delivery outside off, Kamran gets on the front foot and hammers that over extra cover
quickly onto the front foot again, this time to defend
a shorter ball from Sammy, tight around off stump, Kamran hops onto the backfoot and blocks it
slightly slower from Sammy, length ball outside off, punched towards extra cover
overpitched on offstump, Kamran gets behind the line and drives firmly towards mid-on
Tonge starts this over with a no-ball, that delivery jagged away after pitching on a length outside off, free-hit time
a massive six from Malik, backing away and clobbers a short ball over point, that actually sails out of the stadium, what an outstanding shot that is
much better from Tonge, short of a length nipping into Malik, tapped towards cover point
slightly wider outside off, steered behind backward point
Toneg keeps pegging at a short-of-length, there was a bit of width this time for Akmal, who swings at it and misses
slightly fuller, and closer to the offstump, a hint of movement away, Akmal is beaten as he looks to drive through the off
Akmal fails to make contact with the ball thrice in a row, he wafts outside off this time, good comeback from Tonge after that free-hit
starts with a length ball outside off that snakes in towards the batsman, Malik shoulders arms
good carry through to the keeper for Best, this was well outside off and Malik was interested in playing it
back of a length, steep bounce for Best, Malik shuffles across the stumps and jabs it back down the pitch
a fuller length from Best, Malik drives powerfully towards cover, a diving fielder takes the pace off the ball
length ball outside off, Malik punches it towards extra cover, the batsmen sprint through for a single
quick delivery, 140kmh, attempted yorker which ends up as a low full toss, a thick outside edge sends the ball towards third man
Tonge strikes again with the first ball of the over, Akmal nicks it to the keeper, a back of length ball outside off, Akmal wanted to hammer it past extra cover, only manages to get an outside edge
Mohammad Yousuf leaves his first ball alone, a length ball shaping away from the batsman
shorter in length, in the channel outside off, blocked off the back foot
closer to the offstump this time, tapped towards midwicket, Yousuf is off the mark
Tonge keeps pegging away outside off, Malik gets forward and defends
slighty overpitched, Malik drives it past mid-off for a single
bangs in a a quick bouncer, 90mph, 145kmh, Malik bends and gets out of the way
on the pads, clipped behind square leg , Malik wanted the single but Yousuf sends him back
length ball heading for offstump, the pace remains high, 90.8mph, 146kmh, Malik gets forward and defends
full and wide, driven firmly towards cover, where the fielder does well to stop it
inside egded onto the pads as Malik looked to defend that one
overpitched by Best, a lovely drive from Malik beats the diving mid-off fielder and fetches him four runs
an appeal for lbw, but that struck his very high on the pad, and maybe hit just outside off as well
Yousuf shows the full face of the bat as he blocks that one

a nasty one that, Yousuf is struck in the ribs, he's in pain, Yousuf was looking to play that off the front foot, steep bounce from Tonge surprised him, Yousuf seems okay now though, he sends back the physio who had come to provide some treatment
short of length, defended off the back foot towards cover point
full and wide, driven towards extra cover, no run

dropped, Darren Sammy had to dive to his right at second slip to latch onto that edge from Yousuf, he can't hang on, it was a slightly tough chance but with only 133 on the board you need to hang on to every opportunity
Yousuf stands tall and defends a back of length delivery
whipped off the thigh pad for a couple
a short delivery from Best, Yousuf takes the ball in front of his chest and glides it towards backward square leg
gets forward and drives that one towards cover
Best grunts as he sends down a fullish delivery outside off, defended towards cover point
overpitched on middle, a firm punch towards mid-on
A trademark cover drive from Yousuf, fullish delivery from Tonge, perfect placement from Yousuf gets him four runs
Tonge still managing to get some extra bounce, Yousuf blocks that short of length ball off the back foot
length ball  on off stump, Yousuf shuffles across, perhaps too much, and has to adjust before defending
down the leg side, might have brushed the thigh pad on the way to the keeper
length ball on offstump, textbook forward defense from Yousuf
Malik gets going with a confident punch between cover and extra cover, the outfield is extremely quick here and the chasing fielders didn't have too much of a chance
slips in the bouncer, spotted early and Malik gets out of the way easily
angling into legstump, Malik flicks it towards midwicket, nicely timed by Malik
back of a length, jags into the batsman, who defends it towards the off side
on middle stump, punched just wide of mid-on for a single
on the pads, glanced down to fine leg for another single
on the pads, Malik jabs it towards midwicket
length ball about a foot outside off stump, Malik lift his bat over his head as he lets the ball go
closer to the offstump, Malik is content to defend this one
full and wide, Malik chases after it, but misses, nearly a wide that one
Tonge reverts to his offstump line, Malik shows us more of his defensive technique
moves sharply in. but only after passing the stumps, it started out well outside off and Malik lets that one go
back of a length, heading into legstump, clips it behind square, would have been a tight single if they had gone for it
way down the leg side
Best hurls this one on a length, heading for offstump, defended towards covers
attempted short ball, doesn't rise enough, Yousuf pulls it towards deep backward square leg, that was a controlled shot, one-bounce before crossing the rope
full and outside off, blocked towards cover
full toss just outside off, Best is lucky to get away with that one, Yousuf punches it straight at the fielder at extra cover
this time his poor delivery is punished, it was full and wide, Yousuf bends his knee before square drives that powerfully
Tonge oversteps, and that will be another free-hit, can Malik do a repeat of that mammoth six over point?
Malik backs away again, but Tonge keeps it almost at yorker length outside off, Malik has an almighty heave at it but misses
Tonge sticks to his back-of-length offstump formula, Malik defends
Malik is gone, a thin edge through to the keeper, Tonge increases his length a touch, Malik wafts at it outside off, kisses the ball through to Walton
short and wide, left alone by Misbah
defended off the front foot towards cover
just outside off stump, Misbah is content to let that one go
starts with a delivery that is well outside leg stump
getting the ball to nip in a touch, that pitched too wide outside off to interest the batsman
a length ball, again Yousuf watchfully shoulders arms
too wide outside the off stump for the umpire's liking
Bernard struggling with his line here, this time it is on Yousuf's pads, he glances it fine down the leg side to get a boundary
Yousuf gets forward and turns the ball towards midwicket, Misbah calls him through for a single
Misbah tries to drive a fullish ball outside off towards cover but he mistimes it
full and well outside off, Misbah doesn't offer a shot to that

Tonge's dream evening continues, he gets rid of Yousuf this time, Pakistan can't make a mess of this one, can they? it was a legstump delivery that Yousuf was looking to glance, the ball grazes the thigh pad through to the keeper, umpire thought there was some glove involved and gave him out
full ball outside off, Umar lets that one go
well outside off, again the batsman is content to leave it for the keeper
punched firmly off the front foot towards cover, placement wasn't too great though
Umar leaves yet another outside off delivery alone
angling into the batsman's pads, the ball strikes the thigh pad and rolls towards square leg
Bernard has been getting the ball to dart into the batsman, this time Umar shoulders arms
Bernard sends that down the leg side, his third wide in only his second over
the batsman gets on the backfoot and defends the ball towards the off side
pushed into the covers, doesn't beat the fielder
turned with soft hands towards square leg
that was pretty close to the offstump, but Umar shoulders arms
a firm drive from Umar is cut off by a diving Dale Richards at short cover
a leg stump delivery, Misbah guides it down to fine leg
full ball outside off, defended towards the off side
outside off stump, left alone by Umar
again it was pretty close to the stumps, Umar leaves it for the keeper
and again he doesn't offer a shot, perhaps he has decided to see off Tonge
guided down to third man with soft hands for a single that gets him off the mark
on offstump, blocked towards the off side
gets well forward and defends the ball towards cover
wide outside off stump, slashed towards deep backward point for a couple
nips sharply back towards the batsman, but it started too wide outside off to bother Umar
this one was much closer to the stumps, Umar gets behind the line and defend solidly
an inswinger from Bernard to end the over, pushed to the right of the bowler, who parries it to mid-on
Sammy starts off with a wide delivery outside off, lashed towards point
again it is well outside off, left alone by Misbah
much closer to the stumps, played with soft hands towards backward point, the batsmen zip through for a single
short and wide, a roundhouse cut from Umar sends the ball racing to the point boundary, that will ease some of Pakistan's nerves
pitching on a length and jagging away, the batsman shoulders arms
back of a length, on middle stump, played towards backward point
Misbah looks to turn a middle stump delivery towards midwicket, edges it onto his pads
length ball outside off, gets forward and defends
punched firmly to mid-off, doesn't beat the fielder
Misbah gives some fielding practise for the man at cover this time
mistimes a full ball back towards the bowler
length ball on offstump, nicely flicked towards square leg by Misbah, Umar pushes Misbah into sprinting back for the third
Misbah is in no hurry here, he lets another delivery go through to the keeper
this time he gets forward and defends it towards cover
wide outside off, poked towards backward point
slow, fullish delivery, Misbah's drive beats short cover and fetches him a single
Sammy keeps it tight around offstump, defended off the backfoot
again Umar is happy to defend to the off side
Misbah shuffles across and looks to flick it to midwicket, edges it onto his pads
overpitched on the offstump, driven back to the bowler
Game on, Misbah's stay at the crease is over, he fishes at a delivery outside off, only to nick it to Walton, who snaffles his fourth catch of the day
overpitched on the pads, whipped wide of mid-on for a single
full and wide, lashed to sweeper cover for a single
angling into the pads, defended back down the pitch
more caution from Pakistan, again the ball is played back to the bowler
gets forward and drives towards cover, straight at the fielder
enough of the safety first, says Umar Akmal, slightly overpitched outside off, Umar wallops that over mid-off, one-bounce four
outside off delivery, opens the face to steer the ball towards backward point
swing and a miss from Afridi, that was very close to a top edge, it was a pretty innocuous delivery, straight and outside off

Afridi pushes the ball towards short cover and sets off for the single, Umar responds to his captain's call but Afridi then changes his mind, Dale Richards didn't pick up the ball, else Umar was in trouble
massive appeal for lbw, hit in front of offstump, but the height saves Umar
cautiously defended by Afridi, how often do you get to say that?
overpitched and on the pads, whipped down to long-on for a single
on the pads again, turned towards square leg, should have been an easy stop by Fletcher loses his footing leading to a misfield
played down to third man for a single
Umar Akmal has had enough of hanging around, he latches on to a fullish delivery and crashes it past extra cover for a boundary
he starts with a wide down the leg side
Boom boom loses it there, getting on the front foot looking to absolutely crunch that one towards midwicket, he doesn't connect though
this time his attempted big hit is played with a straight bat, not well timed but the ball sails over the bowler's head
this time Afridi tries a cheeky dab to try guide a bouncer past slips, he misses the ball
on the pads, whipped towards square leg for a couple
opens the face to the bat to steer the ball to third man, nicely done by Afridi
a bit of an inside edge takes the ball towards square leg
overpitched outside off, punched towards cover
Bernard keeps getting the ball to move in a touch with the angle, Umar defends solidly back to the bowler
wonderful running from Pakistan, Umar just dropped the ball at his feet and calls for the single, Afridi responds immediately
Pakistan's 100 comes up as Afridi swipes the ball towards midwicket
Bernard gets this one to hold its line, Umar was looking for the inward movement and is beaten
bang! full ball on middle and leg, Umar muscles it between the bowler and mid-on, Pakistan's chase getting some momentum now
Sammy strays onto legstump, Afridi clips it towards deep square leg for a single
back of a length, wrong line again, on the leg stump, Umar moves across and guides the ball to long leg, Umar races back for the second
played with soft hands towards mid-in, after a bit of hesitation the batsmen go for the single
Afridi tries to work a ball from outside off towards midwicket, doesn't connect well, the ball rolls towards slip
Afridi is again looking to turn it to the leg side, outside edge takes the ball towards cover
overpitched on the pads, Afridi shows the full face of the bat as he drives it down to long-on
Tino Best starts his new spell with a wide down the leg side
Afridi, as he has tried all innings, turns an offstump ball towards midwicket
too full and on the pads, Umar Akmal whips that behind square leg for a boundary
this is awful stuff from Best, another wide down the leg side
Umar Akmal again shows he can do aggression very well, clobbers a leg stump ball to the long-on boundary
driven firmly off the front foot towards long-off for an easy couple

Umar Akmal is in serious pain here after being hit by a beamer, he ducked but in trying to defend he tried to get his bat in the way and is hit flush on the finger, he is jumping around in pain, takes off his glove to take a look at his fingers, luckily he seems to be alright, he's even managed to flash a smile when Afridi asks how he's doing
it's a back of a length, outside off, steered down to third man for a single
this one is speared into Afridi, who gets on the back foot and defends the ball back down the pitch
Sammy pegs away at a back of a length, pushed towards cover for a single
Afridi is beaten as he gets on the front foot and looks to power a short-of-length delivery through the off side
Afridi leaves an outside-off delivery through to the keeper
it was a pretty full ball, but Afridi flatbats it towards midwicket
'Two, two, two' says Umar as he punches the ball towards long-on, Afridi is back in a flash for the second
chases a wide delivery outside off but doesn't make contact
Afridi shows he has touch as well, opening the face and dabbing  delivery from outside off to the third man boundary
Best has struggled with his line and length all day, and he sends down yet another wide down the leg side to level the teams' scores
Afridi punches the ball towards cover, thinks of a single but then decides against it
a superb yorker from Best, Afridi manages to dig it out towards the bowler
Best's poor day ends with another wide down the leg side which gives Pakistan victory
